JobTitle: Strategic Renewals Account Manager - Opportunity for Working Remotely
JobFullDesc: Business Summary:This fast-growing Austin-based Renewals team is looking to add a Strategic Renewals Account Manager to run all contract renewals for VMware's top customers worldwide.This is your opportunity to get in at the ground-level of a high impact and high visibility team while acting as the voice and face of VMware.Are you ready to join a professional, skilled and visible team who is highly engaged in the biggest deals for the company?Job Role and Responsibilities:The Strategic Renewals Account Manager will be responsible for managing high value renewals across VMware’s largest and most strategic customers. This person will also be responsible for managing a portion of VMware’s SaaS renewals. The purpose is to drive high retention rates across renewals in addition to leveraging the renewal event to increase the net new license attach rate by cross selling and upselling VMware’s emerging technologies and adding new services. This person will be required to work with cross functional departments such as license sales, global support, PSO to ensure alignment and to drive increased customer success and adoption. Success will come from forging strategic relationships with field sales and educating the field on how a renewal event can drive a net new Enterprise Agreement for VMware. This role is essential to VMware as we help our customers find the right balance between private and public Cloud.Required Skills:5+ years of validated sales experience and/or customer success/ renewals experienceExtensive experience negotiating multi-million-dollar deals (Renewals or Net new) with extremely complex terms, conditions, price pressures and considerations.Significant experience in a quota carrying sales role with proven achievement.Customer Success / Support / Advocacy experience is key given the different types of data and discussions this person will be engaged in with the customerHistory of coordination within an internal set of multi-functional teams such as Systems Engineers, Inside Reps, Field Marketing, Professional Services, Account Executives and Channel Management to ensure target quotas are achieved and exceededPreferred Skills:Customer success experience in the SaaS industrySLED vertical experienceAbility to interact, compile and summarize various data sources and work with both our Field account executives and customers with strategic product and service discussionsOperational discipline and efficiency with previous experience building cross organizational relationshipsAbility to make good decisions in the spirit of the strategic direction of the organization independentlyHighly trusted individual who maintains and expect high standards for self and team. Compatible with VMware’s EPIC2 valuesCategory : SalesSubcategory: Inside SalesExperience: Manager and ProfessionalFull Time/ Part Time: Full TimePosted Date: 2021-07-07Global Licensing & Renewals: License revenue makes up about one-third of VMware’s overall revenue, and our Global License Advisory, Renewals, and E-commerce team plays a vital role in its protection and growth. We ensure customers and partners use their licenses in accordance with their agreements, while supporting the company’s goal of annual double-digit license growth. Our team manages VMware’s Global Software and Subscription Renewal practice across multiple contracts worldwide, which includes finalizing renewals and finding opportunities for cross-selling and up-selling licenses. We also focus on driving net new license transactions through our 12 online web stores around the world. On our team, you’ll gain critical skills and experience by working closely with other departments ranging from Sales to Systems Engineering.
